name: Xenobreak
description:
Xenobreak is a game inspired by Breakout and Space Invaders!

Use the paddle to defend earth from the invading aliens!

Collect powerups to make it easier to take out more aliens.

Don't lose all your lives or Earth will be invaded!

Enjoy! And thanks for playing!

Let me know if you're having trouble playing! I'm most likely to respond via twitter @Sharktoothman11
